claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Kirk Douglas  (  born Issur Danielovitch , December 9 , 1916  )  is an American actor , producer , director , and author .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is one of the last living people of the film industry 's Golden Age .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After an impoverished childhood with immigrant parents and six sisters , he had his film debut in The Strange Love of Martha Ivers  (  1946  )  with Barbara Stanwyck .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Douglas soon developed into a leading box-office star throughout the 1950s and 1960s , known for serious dramas , including westerns and war movies .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: During his career he appeared in more than 90 movies .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Douglas became an international star through positive reception for his leading role as an unscrupulous boxing hero in Champion  (  1949  )  , which brought him his first nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actor .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Other early films include Young Man with a Horn  (  1950  )  , playing opposite Lauren Bacall and Doris Day ; Ace in the Hole opposite Jan Sterling  (  1951  )  ; and Detective Story  (  1951  )  .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He received a second Oscar nomination for his dramatic role in The Bad and the Beautiful  (  1952  )  , opposite Lana Turner , and his third nomination for portraying Vincent van Gogh in Lust for Life  (  1956  )  .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1955 , he established Bryna Productions , which began producing films as varied as Paths of Glory  (  1957  )  and Spartacus  (  1960  )  .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In those two films , he starred and collaborated with the then relatively unknown director , Stanley Kubrick .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Douglas helped break the Hollywood blacklist by having Dalton Trumbo write Spartacus with an official on-screen credit , although Trumbo 's family claims he overstated his role .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He produced and starred in Lonely Are the Brave  (  1962  )  , considered a cult classic , and Seven Days in May  (  1964  )  , opposite Burt Lancaster , with whom he made seven films .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1963 , he starred in the Broadway play One Flew Over the Cuckoo 's Nest , a story he purchased , which he later gave to his son Michael Douglas , who turned it into an Oscar-winning film .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As an actor and philanthropist , Douglas has received three Academy Award nominations , an Oscar for Lifetime Achievement , and the Presidential Medal of Freedom .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As an author , he has written ten novels and memoirs .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Currently , he is No. 17 on the American Film Institute 's list of the greatest male screen legends of classic Hollywood cinema , and the highest-ranked living person on the list .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After barely surviving a helicopter crash in 1991 and then suffering a stroke in 1996 , he has focused on renewing his spiritual and religious life .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He lives with his second wife  (  of 63 years  )  , Anne , a producer .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He turned 100 on December 9 , 2016 .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Apart from his career in the film industry , Douglas has received notice for his humanitarian and political activism , as well as media attention for his marriage to Catherine Zeta-Jones , and his tongue cancer diagnosis .

claim: Kirk Douglas is an acting professional in the film industry.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His early acting roles included film , stage , and television productions .
